channel.title: Café Resto on Yen's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Café Resto on Yen's blog

item.title: Québec, 3-July
item.description: We had our fill of the city yesterday, so it seemed like time to head out to the country. We also learned that William and Kate would be in town as part of their Canada tour, an event undoubtedly to be attended by legions of their admirers and non-admirers alike. That cemented the decision for us. First stop is the Montmorency Falls. At 84 meters, it’s higher than Niagara Falls.
